skills.title: .NET Development
skills.description: Experienced in .NET 4.0/4.5, ASP.NET MVC 5, and ASP.NET Core 6.0/8.0 for building scalable, high-performance web applications. Skilled in C#, VB.NET, LINQ, and ADO.Net.

skills.title: Cloud & Deployment
skills.description: Proficient in deploying applications on AWS and Microsoft Azure, utilizing Docker for containerization and optimizing CI/CD pipelines using Azure DevOps.

skills.title: Databases
skills.description: Skilled in working with MySQL, Oracle, SQL Server, and MongoDB. Experienced in writing optimized T-SQL queries and designing efficient database schemas.

skills.title: RESTful API Development
skills.description: Expertise in designing and optimizing RESTful APIs using ASP.Net Core, OAuth 2.0 authentication, and Python-based frameworks like Flask and Django.

skills.title: Development Tools & Methodologies
skills.description: Adept in Agile (Scrum) and Waterfall methodologies, using tools like Jira, GitHub, SVN, and TFS. Proficient in unit testing frameworks including NUnit and MSTest.

portfolio.title: Capital One - Banking Application
portfolio.description: Developed a banking platform using ASP.NET Core, React.js, and SQL Server, enhancing user experience and reducing load times by 25%. Implemented API versioning and OAuth 2.0 authentication for secure data transactions.

portfolio.title: Medical IoT Management System
portfolio.description: Designed a microservices-based application to manage medical IoT devices, leveraging .NET Core, Angular, and PostgreSQL. Utilized AWS Lambda for serverless computing and optimized real-time data processing with RabbitMQ.

portfolio.title: Customer Management & Invoicing System
portfolio.description: Built a comprehensive invoicing system using ASP.NET MVC, C#, and Entity Framework, enabling seamless customer tracking and automated invoicing, reducing manual workload by 40%.
